balls

Class Balls

  • java.lang.Object
    • balls.Balls
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gui.GraphicalElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BouncingBalls

    public class Balls
extends java.lang.Object
implements gui.GraphicalElement
    Vector of Balls represented by Points. This modelisation fits with the wording.

      • Balls

        public Balls(int ballNumber,
             java.awt.Point initVelocity,
             int maxWidth,
             int maxHeight)
        Creates ballNumber balls with random coordinates between maxWidth and maxHeight.
        Parameters:
        ballNumber - The number of balls.
        initVelocity - The initial velocity of balls.
        maxWidth - The maximum X to generate a ball.
        maxHeight - The maximum Y to generate a ball.
